page_description: Here you can find answers to the most common questions about our platform

what_is_whatsgonow.question: What is Whatsgonow?
what_is_whatsgonow.answer: Whatsgonow is a crowd logistics platform that enables spontaneous or planned deliveries by private individuals or local drivers. The platform mediates orders, enables price negotiations, and provides a secure payment and rating system.

registration_required.question: Is registration necessary?
registration_required.answer: Yes, both drivers and contractors must register. Drivers additionally need to complete a verification (KYC) process.

find_transport_orders.question: How do I find suitable transport orders?
find_transport_orders.answer: As a driver, you'll receive suggestions based on your route, your area, and your transport profile.

payment_process.question: How does the payment work?
payment_process.answer: Payment is reserved when the deal is confirmed (e.g., via PayPal) and released after successful delivery.

problem_handling.question: What should I do if I encounter problems?
problem_handling.answer: Use the support button or report an incident in the deal chat. Community managers will support you in your region.

contact_support.title: Still have questions?
contact_support.description: If you couldn't find an answer to your question, please contact our support team.
